Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It was easier asking questions to GenAI but the accuracy of the teacher is more.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: A feedback from GenAI does not make me feel anything but a feedback from the teacher will make me feel more sure of my work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: If the feedback is about more general information, the GenAI may give more detailed answers.
